title: 3 Cathie Wood Investments That Could Deliver Superior Returns
text: These exciting growth stocks are all attractive to buy now.

title: Google workers protesting in California and New York
text: Some Google workers recently demonstrated in California and New York. On Thursday, they protested in the Big Apple over the big round of layoffs that affected 12,000.

title: Making Sense of Apple, Amazon and Big Tech Earnings
text: The market's contrasting reactions to December-quarter results from the 'Big 5 Tech Players' - Apple, Amazon, Alphabet, Meta & Microsoft - provides us with useful clues as to what is most important to investors in these mega-cap players.

title: Google tries to reassure investors on AI progress as ChatGPT breathes down its neck
text: Google worked to reassure investors and analysts on Thursday during its quarterly earnings call that it's still a leader in developing AI. The company's Q4 2022 results were highly anticipated as investors and the tech industry awaited Google's response to the popularity of OpenAI's ChatGPT, which has the potential to threaten its core business.

title: Why FAANG Stocks Made Big Moves Friday
text: Investors learned a lot about how these huge companies have fared in recent months.

title: Google, Apple, Amazon give investors reason to fret
text: Wall Street has its eyes on big tech after some of the biggest companies in the world posted lackluster quarterly financial performances.

title: Google missed estimates in Q4: ‘it's still the fabric of the internet'
text: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOGL), on Friday, seems to be recovering its after-hours losses from last night that materialised after the search giant came in shy of Street estimates in its fiscal fourth quarter. Analyst reacts to Google's quarterly results Excluding traffic-acquisition costs (TAC), though, the tech behemoth brought in $63.

title: Google: Earnings Miss But Don't Forget Advertising Is Cyclical
text: Alphabet (Google) is the king of search, owns YouTube, and the world's most popular mobile operating system Android. The company reported poor financial results for Q4,22 as it missed both top and bottom line growth estimates.

title: Why Alphabet Stock Dropped and Then Recovered Today
text: Alphabet missed the mark in the fourth-quarter earnings report.

title: ChatGPT Is Just The 'Tip Of The Iceberg' In Content-Creating Artificial Intelligence; Get Ready For 'A Lot Of Disruption' (Not Just At Google)
text: ChatGPT and other new content-creating artificial intelligence tools could disrupt Google's internet search business and lots of industries. Are you ready for drugs created by an AI system?

title: Google's parent company is leveraging AI to improve productivity and operational efficiency, but efforts will take time to reflect on balance sheet, analysts say
text: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG) is on the right track by betting big on artificial intelligence, but it likely won't see its efforts pay off on the balance sheet until its cost reduction initiatives take hold, according to analysts. In a note following its 4Q 2022 results, which highlighted slowing revenue and contracting margins, analysts at Canaccord zeroed in on the Big Tech giant's AI initiatives.

title: Disappointing Earnings From Alphabet, Amazon And Apple
text: Markets have staged an impressive rally so far this year.

title: Unpacking Today's Big Tech Earnings
text: Just one day after the Nasdaq and S&P 500 got a boost from Meta Platforms' (META) fourth-quarter report, the market is reacting to the quarterly results from three other Big Tech giants.

title: Google's ChatGPT competitor is a big deal, but the company's earnings point to near-term struggles, Gene Munster says
text: Google has been calling itself an AI company since 2016, and its version of ChatGPT will be a "big deal," according to Deepwater's Gene Munster.

title: AI will help Google parent Alphabet navigate a challenging macro environment, say analysts
text: Google parent Alphabet Inc., which has been beating the AI drum for years, can now harness the technology to navigate the current challenging macro environment, say analysts.

title: Big Tech earnings face more heat as cloud cover fades
text: Big Tech results reinforced concerns a boom in cloud services is easing, limiting a lucrative source of profit when a slowing economy has hit the companies' other businesses and prompting a bet on artificial intelligence as the next growth driver.

title: Apple, Alphabet and Amazon stock selloff would reduce their market caps by more than $150 billion combined
text: The selloff in the shares of AAA technology behemoths — Apple Inc., Alphabet Inc. and Amazon.com Inc. — that reported quarterly results overnight are shaving off a combined $158.5 billion from the companies' market capitalizations. But that loss would be just about 38% of what the $254.5 billion gained the day before earnings were reported.

title: U.S. stock futures tumble ahead of jobs data, with tech under pressure as Apple, Amazon and Alphabet fall after results
text: U.S. stock futures fell Friday ahead of an important update on the labor market, with tech bearing the brunt of losses following disappointing results from Amazon.com, Apple and Alphabet.

title: Apple, Amazon and Alphabet expose difficult reality of after two days of tech gains
text: After two days of markets being led higher by tech stocks, giants Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL), Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) and Google owner Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG) all delivered disappointing earnings that showed the situation is less than rosy. Three of the world's largest companies falling short of Wall Street estimates confirmed the impact of declining consumer confidence as the global economic outlook remains uncertain.
